Sentencas: The powder morphology and particle size of both mixtures of ultrafine yttria-doped zirconia (3 to 8 mol % Y2O3) and aluminium hydroxide (0 to 20 wt % Al2O3), and zirconia/yttria/alumina coprecipitated powders were studied using measurements of surface area, X-ray diffraction, differential thermal analysis, infrared spectroscopy, scanning electron microscopy, and transmission electron microscopy.
